document_data.mainbody:
Elranu Graywind was a renowned elven musical instrument crafter active sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Elranu Graywinds work was known for its luxuriousness and delicate intricacies. One of the master crafter harps, simply known as an elven harp of Elranu, was uncovered in the mid-to-late 14 century DR in the mountains of the Vast, among the treasures of a band of giants. This instrument was a unique mohagony harp decorated with detailed carvings of unicorns with eyes of inlaid white sapphires and holy vines with berries of tiny rubies. The masterpiece was valued at 5,000 gold coins.
